name: Dungeon Prelude
description:
Hello! Dungeon Prelude is my college project made for Level Design classes. It took about one month to create. 

Explore mighty castle and dungeons below. Find vicious creature ready to kill you with their scream. As a simple thief you have to overcome many obstacles to get away with your crimes. Find the portal and escape!
